Customization

public struct Customization: JSONDecodable

A custom language model.

  • customizationID

    The ID of this custom language model.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let customizationID: String
  • created

    The creation date of the custom language model, in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let created: String
  • language

    The language of the custom language model. For example, en-US or ja-JP.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let language: String
  • dialect

    The dialect of the language for the custom model. For US English and Japanese models, the field is always en-US or ja-JP. For Spanish models, the field indicates the dialect for which the model was created: es-ES for Castilian Spanish (the default); es-LA for Latin-American Spanish; or es-US for North-American (Mexican) Spanish.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let dialect: String
  • owner

    The ID of the service credentials for the owner of this model.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let owner: String
  • name

    The name of the custom language model.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let name: String
  • description

    The description of the custom language model.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let description: String
  • baseModelName

    The name of the base language model for which this custom language model was created.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let baseModelName: String
  • status

    The current status of the custom language model.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let status: CustomizationStatus
  • progress

    A percentage indicating the progress of the model’s current training. A value of 100 means that the model is fully trained.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let progress: Int
  • warnings

    If the request contained unknown query parameters, a list of those unknown parameters will be included here.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let warnings: String?
  • init(json:)

    Used internally to initialize a Customization model from JSON.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(json: JSONWrapper) throws
